name: Talent Gurus
tag_list: seo-services, virtual-assistant, virtual-assistant-services, offshore-outsourcing, outsourcing-services, bpo-services, back-office-services, back-office-support
overview:
Talent Gurus provides Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) services to companies in the US utilizing the resources of our facility in Hyderabad, India. Our BPO solutions allow customers to improve profit margins and focus on their core competencies. Companies can be connected with skilled, qualified, and motivated resources who will enhance productivity and performance.

Services SEO Services Virtual Assistant Business Process Outsourcing Services Information Technology Outsourcing Services Recruitment Process Outsourcing Services

Talent Gurus is a division of Talent Logic, Inc. a staffing solutions firm with a nationwide presence that has been in business for over 20 years

Talent Gurus offers outsourcing services that are guaranteed to save clients 55%-60%. You will have access to seamless communication services, offshore premises for offshore consultants, and guaranteed cost savings.
